name: Soulmates: Revenge of Orpheus
description:
Based off of Greek mythology, we bring you Soulmates: Revenge of Orpheus! After Eurydice, Orpheus' lover, died due to a snakebite, Orpheus heads to Hades to find his lost beloved. Without her he is no longer whole. Using his half heart lyre, Orpheus plans to fight through hades in order to find his other half!

Download the Build.zip folder, unzip, and run the Soulmates executable.

Controls:

WASD to move in cardinal directions.

Use mouse and left click to aim and shoot.
